title: datalad ls s3:// shouldn't list all the versions of the file/key unless -a is given
body:
```
$> datalad ls s3://openfmri/ds001/demographics.txt
Connecting to bucket: openfmri
2016-09-15 11:47:40,106 [INFO   ] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket openfmri (s3.py:82)
Bucket info:
  Versioning: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
     Website: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
         ACL: <Policy: openfmri (owner) = READ, openfmri (owner) = WRITE, openfmri (owner) = READ_ACP, openfmri (owner) = WRITE_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = WRITE, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = READ_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ_ACP>
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:57:20.000Z  288 ver:aCG_GB8WyRCUbM_A2NlufxnRVDyC_REe  acl:Access Denied  http://openfmri.s3.amazonaws.com/ds001/demographics.txt?versionId=aCG_GB8WyRCUbM_A2NlufxnRVDyC_REe [OK]
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:49:59.000Z  289 
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:49:32.000Z  289 
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T17:12:49.000Z  288 
(venv-tests) 2 16739.....................................:Thu 15 Sep 2016 11:47:40 AM EDT:.
hopa:/tmp/ds000201
$> datalad ls -a s3://openfmri/ds001/demographics.txt 
Connecting to bucket: openfmri
2016-09-15 11:47:49,874 [INFO   ] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket openfmri (s3.py:82)
Bucket info:
  Versioning: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
     Website: S3ResponseError: 403 Forbidden
         ACL: <Policy: openfmri (owner) = READ, openfmri (owner) = WRITE, openfmri (owner) = READ_ACP, openfmri (owner) = WRITE_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = WRITE, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/s3/LogDelivery = READ_ACP, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ, http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers = READ_ACP>
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:57:20.000Z  288 ver:aCG_GB8WyRCUbM_A2NlufxnRVDyC_REe  acl:Access Denied  http://openfmri.s3.amazonaws.com/ds001/demographics.txt?versionId=aCG_GB8WyRCUbM_A2NlufxnRVDyC_REe [OK]
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:49:59.000Z  289 ver:2p0vXVgICX64PCLKim86Ea1xGwYC1Xpk  acl:Access Denied  http://openfmri.s3.amazonaws.com/ds001/demographics.txt?versionId=2p0vXVgICX64PCLKim86Ea1xGwYC1Xpk [OK]
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T19:49:32.000Z  289 ver:GaH7NDcIx_MxO92AkdXEo1W3NcPrzaBQ  acl:Access Denied  http://openfmri.s3.amazonaws.com/ds001/demographics.txt?versionId=GaH7NDcIx_MxO92AkdXEo1W3NcPrzaBQ [OK]
ds001/demographics.txt 2014-06-05T17:12:49.000Z  288 ver:null                              acl:Access Denied  http://openfmri.s3.amazonaws.com/ds001/demographics.txt?versionId=null [OK]
```
